meanings.definition: A board or boards that form the headboard or footboard of a bed.
meanings.sent1: The bedboards at the head of the bed are made of sturdy wood.
meanings.sent2: She leaned against the bedboards while reading a book.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loves to scratch the bedboards, thinking they are a giant scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The bedboards stood tall like guardians at the head of the bed.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the bedboards added elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: A board or boards that support a mattress on a bed frame.
meanings.sent1: The bedboards underneath the mattress ensure a comfortable sleep.
meanings.sent2: He checked the bedboards to make sure they were properly aligned.
meanings.sent3: The bedboards whispered creaks and groans as he tossed and turned in bed.
meanings.sent4: The bedboards cradled the mattress like a gentle embrace.
meanings.sent5: She felt the firm support of the bedboards beneath her as she lay down to rest.
